charges.charge_disposition: dft placed on probation for a term of 3 years; dft shall comply with the following add'l conditions: 1) Pay restitution bal during the 1st 30 months of supervision, through the US Atty's Ofc, on a schedule determined by the Prob Ofc with the appropriate considerations to be given to other financial responsibilities; 2) provide Prob Ofc w/access to any req financial inform; 3) not incur new credit charges or open add'l lines of credit w/o approval of the Prob Ofc; 4) successfully participate in any substance abuse counseling program, which may include chemical or Breathalyzer testing, as direfted by the Prob Ofc, &; pay any assoc costs as directed by the Prob Ofc; 5) successfully participate in a program of home detention for 6 mos which may include electronic monitoring, with the costs to be paid by the dft, in accordance w/her financial ability; dft shall pay the following financial penalties: MSA $50.00; Restitution $26, 000.00 (1)
